overview: Mick O'Brien is a young Chicago street thug torn between a life of petty crime and the love of his girlfriend. But when the heist of a local drug dealer goes tragically wrong Mick is sentenced to a brutal juvenile prison where violence is a rite of passage and respect is measured in vengeance.
tagline: There's Only One Person Left Who Believes Mick O'Brien Can Make It... Mick O'Brien.
title: Bad Boys
